text:
Everyone seems to be having a good time.
What's going on?

Oh, we were just talking to Yuika about
the greatness of the dorm.

If Yuika were here too,
it would've been so much fun~!

Haha, thanks for the kind words.
Dorms do give off a feeling of youth, don't they?

Isn't the time we can't be
together also important?

Feeling like we can share both the
happy and sad moments together...

Yeah, and having someone by your side
is the most reassuring thing.

Hehe, if Yuika were here,
the dorm would be even livelier.

That'd be great~! With Mamimi and Kiriko
too, it'd be even more exciting~!

Huh, Producer, quite the romantic, huh?
...But there might be some truth to that.

Indeed...! Thinking about sharing this when
we meet next time sounds fun!
